description.english: Have no reserves left for Skeletons, Hulks and Necromancer.

description.spanish: Quédate sin reservas para los Esqueletos, Moles y Nigromante.
description.schinese: 没有足够的资源储备用来生产骷髅战士、亡灵巨怪和亡灵法师。

description.schinese: 用火球法术摧毁一座防御塔

displayName.english: More mana more mana more mana!

displayName.french: Plus de mana, plus de mana, plus de mana
displayName.italian: Più mana più mana più mana!
displayName.schinese: 法力！我要法力！我要更多法力！

description.english: Acquire 100 extra mana from the use of Mana Catalysts.
description.german: Erlange 100 zusätzliches Mana durch den Einsatz von Mana-Katalysatoren.
description.french: Obtiens 100 manas supplémentaires à l’aide des catalyseurs de mana.
description.italian: Ottieni 100 mana extra con il catalizzatore Mana.
description.koreana: 마나 촉매를 사용해 100개의 추가 마나 획득.
description.spanish: Consigue 100 manás extra del uso del Catalizadores de Maná.
description.schinese: 通过使用魔力催化剂获得超过 100 点法力值。

description.english: Kill 15 enemies with a single trigger of a Spike Trap
description.german: Töte 15 Gegner durch einmaliges Auslösen einer Stachelfalle
description.french: Tue 15 ennemis à l’aide d’un déclenchement unique d’un piège à pointes
description.italian: Uccidi 15 nemici attivando una trappola una sola volta
description.koreana: 스파이크 트랩의 단일 트리거로 적 15명 무찌르기
description.spanish: Mata a 15 enemigos con un sólo disparo de una Trampa de Espinas
description.schinese: 通过地刺陷阱一次杀死 15 个敌人

description.english: Kill 10 or more troops trapped in a single Stasis before it expires
description.german: Töte 10 oder mehr Truppen, die in einer einzigen Stase gefangen sind, bevor die Zeit abläuft
description.french: Tue 10 troupes ou plus prises au piège dans une stase unique avant qu’elle n’expire
description.italian: Uccidi 10 o più soldati intrappolati in una singola stasi prima che scada
description.koreana: 단일 마비 주문이 만료되기 전에 갇힌 군단 10개 이상 무찌르기
description.spanish: Mata 10 o más tropas atrapadas en una sola Estasis antes de que caduque
description.schinese: 在一个静止力场失效前，杀死至少 10 个被力场困住的敌方部队

description.english: Have a single Behemoth acquire more than 30 troop kills.
description.german: Habe einen einzigen Behemoth, der mehr als 30 Truppen getötet hat.
description.french: Fais en sorte qu’un Béhémoth obtienne plus de 30 destructions de troupes.

description.spanish: Has que un sólo Behemot consiga mas de 30 muertes de topas.
